accessibility.summary: Modifies how an element interacts with assistive technologies.

alignment.summary: Modifies how text is aligned in a page section.

background-color.summary: Modifies the background color of an element.

display.summary: Modifies how an element is displayed in a page section.

flex.summary: Modifies the layout and alignment of elements in a page section.

float.summary: Floats elements inside of a page section.

sizing.summary: Modifies the width and height of elements in a page section.

spacing.summary: Modifies the spacing of elements in a page section.

text.summary: Modifies the styling of text elements.
